context: Amazon.com, Inc. is a e-commerce, cloud computing, and technology conglomerate focused on online retail, AWS cloud services, streaming, devices, and advertising. Pandemic e-commerce surge. AWS essential for remote work. Hired 500K+ workers to meet demand.
